    (VP (MD would)

        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NN money) (POS 's))
          (NN worth))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ low) (NNS rentals))
    (VP (VBP mean)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
            (VP (VB have)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB work)
                    (PP (IN around)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN clock)))
                    (NP (NN everyday))))))))))
    (. .)))

amod(rentals-3, low-2)
nsubj(mean-4, rentals-3)
root(ROOT-0, mean-4)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (ADVP (RB invariably))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN food))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (VP (VBN produced)
              (PP
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (JJ limited) (NNS quantities)))
                (CC but)
                (PP (IN with)
                  (NP
                    (ADJP (RB much) (JJR more))
                    (NN care)
                    (CC and)
                    (NN passion))))
              (SBAR (IN than)
                (S
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN hawker))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP who))
                      (S
                        (VP (VBZ is)
                          (VP (VBG working))))))
                  (VP (VBP round)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN clock))
                    (PP (IN at)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ air-con) (NN food) (NN court)))
                    (ADVP
                      (ADVP (RB just) (RB so))
                      (SBAR (IN that)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP he))
                          (VP (MD can)
                            (VP (VB meet)
                              (NP (DT the) (JJ rental) (NNS payments)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(means-3, This-1)
advmod(means-3, invariably-2)
root(ROOT-0, means-3)
mark(produced-8, that-4)
det(food-6, the-5)

auxpass(produced-8, is-7)
ccomp(means-3, produced-8)
prep(produced-8, in-9)
amod(quantities-11, limited-10)
pobj(in-9, quantities-11)
cc(in-9, but-12)
conj(in-9, with-13)
advmod(more-15, much-14)
amod(care-16, more-15)
pobj(with-13, care-16)
cc(care-16, and-17)
conj(care-16, passion-18)
mark(round-25, than-19)
det(hawker-21, the-20)
nsubj(round-25, hawker-21)
nsubj(working-24, who-22)
aux(working-24, is-23)
rcmod(hawker-21, working-24)
advcl(produced-8, round-25)
det(clock-27, the-26)
dobj(round-25, clock-27)
prep(round-25, at-28)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NNP NEA) (POS 's))
      (NN decision)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB build)
            (NP (JJR more) (NN hawker) (NNS centres))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN decision))
      (SBAR (IN for)
        (S
          (NP (PRP us))
          (VP (VBZ foodies)))))
    (. .)))

          (, ,))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB let)
      (NP (PRP 's))
      (RB not)
      (VP (VB forget)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (EX there))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADVP (RB also))
              (NP
                (NP (JJ other) (NNS segments))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ our) (NN society))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WP whom))
                        (S
                          (NP (DT a) (NN hawker) (NN stall))
                          (VP (VBZ is)
                            (NP (DT an) (JJ attractive) (NN option))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Conclusion))
      (VP (VBP Do) (RB n't)))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP agree)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Crayfish))
            (PP (IN atop)
              (NP (DT the) (NN hokkien) (NN mee))))
          (ADVP (RB really))
          (VP (VBZ does)
            (S
              (VP (VB make)
                (SBAR
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP want)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB go)
                            (S
                              (NP (EX there))
                              (ADVP (RB just))
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB try)
                                  (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))))))
    (. ?)))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP
        (NP (# #) (CD 03-177))

      (CC and)
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Food) (NNP Centre) (NNP Singapre))

          (QP (CD 618495) (CD 98382241)))))
    (ADVP (RB 11.30))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (CD 9.30) (NN pm) (NNP Mon))))
    (, ,)))
